About PAT Marketing

we are a business unit from port authority of thailand committed to support your business to grow effectively and smoothly.

Our team is comprised of deep knowledge of logistics market in Thailand.

We understand all obstacles in seeking opportunity to grow your logistics business in this special market. Let us be your point of contact to make your business successful even easier.

To unlock your untapped opportunities, we are the right person to give you consultation and find the business solution that best meet your needs, whether you are ocean carriers, shippers, forwarders, terminal operators, or logistics provider. Let us help you make your business grow effectively and smoothly.

Port Authority of Thailand,

444 Ta Rua Road, Klong Toey,

Bangkok, Thailand 10110.
